data.soundslist.infos.title: Sounds to study
data.soundslist.infos.text: You can combine sounds to create a harmony that you like, it is recommended to combine only 3 sounds.
data.pomodoro.infos.title: Pomodoro
data.pomodoro.infos.text: This feature is a simple pomodoro to help you on organize your studies. You receive a notification and an alarm sound on time of activity end.
